titleStmt.author: Aelianus.
Bingham, John, Captain.
Droeshout, Martin, b. 1601, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Beale and Thomas Brudenell] for Ralph Mab,

notesStmt.note: In fact consists of chapters 30, 31, and 34-54 of the complete "Tactica", with notes added.
Running title reads: The tacticks of Ælian, or the art of embattailing armies.
Another issue, with cancel title page, of the edition with "printed by Iohn Beale and Thomas Brudenell for Ralph Mab" in the imprint.
The plate is signed "Mar DR sculpsit", i.e. Martin Droeshout.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
